::: {.callout-warning}
## AI Policy

**Allowed (study support):**

- Clarifying your own notes or assigned readings
- Generating practice questions (not answers to assigned problems)
- Explaining concepts at a different level *for studying*

**Not allowed (graded work):**

- Generating or rewriting homework solutions, derivations, or explanations you submit
- Submitting AI-generated reasoning you cannot reproduce on your own

**Always disclose AI use** in your grade memos, even if the use was allowed.
:::
